name: Tree Bowling
description:
Tree bowling was made in 3h for Trijam 83.

MOVE - A/D keys or Left/Right arrows keys

THROW - Space or Mouse button

Did not get completely done since there is no point system. 

(WEB) It's supposed to be first person but it's using wrong camera for some reason. 😝

Programming & gamedev: ZpeedTube

3D models: Warux
